betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §2Primitive Pump§f is an Multiblock that produces water infinitely, but is limited in how much it produces per second.

It depends on the Biome on how much it produces, for example building it in an  Ocean/River Biome will make it produce 1000L/s.

NOTE: Compared to the other Multiblocks, this one needs to be built EXACTLY like the Preview in JEI.
